1.title: Heather
1.plot: The Electric Barbarellas are 5 girls just trying to get their stuff together. Yes, they sing. And they dance. And of course, they are sexy. But that's where the similarities to other girl groups end. For every 2 steps foward, they take 3 steps back.

2.title: Chelsea
2.plot: With producers Midi Mafia on board, the girls get ready to record their first song. But Chelsea starts to question the direction of the group and ultimately her roll as a Barbarella.

3.title: Raven
3.plot: Raven's birthday is coming up and she's got Vegas on her mind. But when she breaks Heather's rules, everyone questions her commitment to the Barbarellas.

4.title: Missy
4.plot: Missy feels torn between her rock band and the Barbarellas when both are vying for her attention. But when the two have events on the same night, she has to make a decision that will have her questioning just who she really is.

5.title: Gynger
5.plot: With a few days off The Barbarellas try to enjoy some R&R. But the girls find Gynger's antics no laughing matter... So Heather tries to get The Barbarellas back on track with a special contest.

6.title: Finale
6.plot: After all their hard work, the Barbarellas start to wonder why they haven't hit it big. Luckily for them, their producers at Midi Mafia have a surprise for the girls that will change their lives forever.

imdb.plot outline: Based on the real-life exploits of an all-girl electronic pop band trying to make it in Hollywood, the show will follow these larger-than-life starlets as they try to stay focused and out of each other's way - It's gonna be a long road to the top!
imdb.title: The Electric Barbarellas
plot: Based on the real-life exploits of an all-girl electronic pop band trying to make it in Hollywood, the show will follow these larger-than-life starlets as they try to stay focused and out of each other's way - It's gonna be a long road to the top!
synopsis: The Electric Barbarellas follows a five-piece electronic pop group trying to successfully break into the music business. After a four-year search that has exhausted her life savings, Heather Naylor recruits wild Missy Marie, model Raven Elise, comedian Gynger Fluellen, and girl-next-door type Chelsea Costa to join her band. Now living together, they record music, promote themselves, and play venues in order to develop a following and make their mark. But while Heather, with the help of assistant Roxann, struggles to find industry insiders willing to help the group get to the next level of their careers, she also discovers that the other women aren't always as willing as she is to make the sacrifices necessary to achieve stardom.
